description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are near the South Pole. Your penguins jump across ice floes, trying to block your opponent and hunt as much fish as possible. The player with the most fish wins. Play against computer opponents, multiplayer on one machine or online using XBox LIVE.
description.short: You are near the South Pole. Your penguins jump across ice floes, trying to block your opponent and hunt as much fish as possible. The player with the most fish wins. Play against computer opponents, multiplayer on one machine or online using XBox LIVE.
